hero.name: Jules
hero.description: Computer Science student, passionate about modern web development and technological innovation.

about.title: A passionate developer,
about.p1: An avid reader of manga and novels, I love creating web experiences that tell a story. My approach to development blends street and raw aesthetics with smooth animations and polished UX.
about.p2: Currently working as an apprentice at Dessine ton meuble/Aryga, I work on innovative projects combining 3D, AI and modern web development.
about.p3: Chill guy but serious when needed, I'm always looking to learn and push the boundaries of what's possible with code.

experience.title: Experience
experience.current: Apprenticeship at Dessine ton meuble/Aryga since 2025

mentality.title: Mentality
mentality.p1: Efficient work, autonomy and communication, it's the key to success. Don't forget to hydrate.

passions.title: Passions
passions.p1: Littérature ('To Your Eternity', 'BLAME', 'La Maison des Feuilles'...) my library is about to explode
passions.p2: Jeux vidéos ('Monster Hunter', 'Zelda', 'Rain World', 'Dark Souls'...) my Steam library is about to explode
passions.p3: Drawing, on the margins of my notebook :P
passions.p4: Skiing in the Alps, I'm chill like that
